title: 3 and Out - NFL Week 11 Top Takeaways, CFB Playoff Picture
itunes:title: 3 and Out - NFL Week 11 Top Takeaways, CFB Playoff Picture
description:
John surveys a wide open field of NFL title contenders after a wild week 11, and reacts to the CFB weekend that clarified the playoff picture, including the Pac-12 seemingly on the outside looking in after Oregon getting run by Utah.

Subscribe NOW and follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates! Check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!
